(поискать если надо будет)
http://flexboxin5.com/
**parent **
display: flex;
display: inline-flex;
flex-flow:  <flex-direction> || <flex-wrap>;
justify-content: flex-start; [flex-end] [center] [space-between] [space-around]
align-items: stretch; [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [baseline]
align-content:  stretch; [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [space-between] [space-around]
flex-direction: row; [column, row-reverse, column-reverse]
flex-wrap: nowrap; [wrap]
**child**
order: 1;
flex:  [ <flex-grow> <flex-shrink>? || <flex-basis> ];
align-self: auto [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [baseline] [stretch]
flex-grow: 1;
flex-shrink: 0;
flex-basis: 200px; [auto]

title: react es6 example
Custom sort
keywords: angular1 custom sort кастомная сортировка своя filter фильтр
text:
<select id="select-sort" ng-model="filter.sort" required ng-options="b.value as b.name for b in bV" ng-init="bV = [{value: 0, name: 'По возрастанию цены'}, {value: 1, name: 'По убыванию цены'}, {value: 2, name: 'По дате заезда'}]; filter.sort=0;">
<div class="tour" ng-repeat="tour in toursFiltered = (tours | filterSort:filter.sort)">

.filter('filterSort', function() {
  return function(tours, sort) {
    tours.sort(function (a, b) {
      if (sort === 0) {
          return a.price > b.price ? 1 :
                 a.price < b.price ? -1 :
                 0;
      }
      if (sort === 1) {
        return a.price < b.price ? 1 :
               a.price > b.price ? -1 :
               0;
      }
      return 0;
    });
    return tours;
  };
})

    container.hide();
    container.eq(index).show()

title: таймер countdown
text:
3 дня
40 часов
59 минут
#countdown { display:none; } .timer_day_text, .timer_hour_text, .timer_min_text { position: absolute; bottom: -20px; width: 100%; text-transform: uppercase; font: 12px 'gill_sansregular'; color: white; left: 0; } var declOfNum = function (number, titles) { var cases = [2, 0, 1, 1, 1, 2]; return titles[ (number % 100 > 4 && number % 100 < 20) ? 2 : cases[(number % 10 < 5) ? number % 10 : 5] ]; } $(document).ready(function () { $('#countdown').countdown({ until: ts, onTick: function (periods) { days = periods[3]; hours = periods[4]; minutes = periods[5]; seconds = periods[6]; $('.timer_day').html((days < 10 ? '' : '') + days); $('.timer_hour').html((hours < 10 ? '0' : '') + hours); $('.timer_min').html((minutes < 10 ? '0' : '') + minutes); $('.timer_sec').html((seconds < 10 ? '0' : '') + seconds); $('.timer_day_text').html(declOfNum(days, ['День', 'Дня', 'Дней'])); $('.timer_hour_text').html(declOfNum(hours, ['Час', 'Часа', 'Часов'])); $('.timer_min_text').html(declOfNum(minutes, ['Минута', 'Минуты', 'Минут'])); $('.timer_sec_text').html(declOfNum(minutes, ['Секунды', 'Секунды', 'Секунд'])); }, tickInterval: 1 }); });

title: дата, повторять каждые несколько часов или дней
keywords: timer count деление повторять каждые 2 дня 6 часов code js
text:
<script>
  var seconds = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)
  seconds = Math.floor(seconds / 194400) * 194400;
  var date = new Date();
  date.setTime(seconds*1000);
 
  var hours = date.getHours()+"";
  var minutes = date.getHours()+"";
  var seconds = date.getSeconds()+"";
  var day = date.getDate()+"";
  var year = date.getFullYear()+"";
  var month = date.getMonth()+"";
  if (seconds.length == 1) seconds = "0"+seconds;
  if (minutes.length == 1) minutes = "0"+minutes;
  if (day.length == 1) day = "0"+day;
  if (year.length == 1) year = "0"+year;
  if (month.length == 1) month = "0"+month;
  if (hours.length == 1) hours = "0"+hours;
  var buf = month+"/"+day+"/"+year+","+hours+":"+seconds; 
  ts = new Date(buf);
</script>

title: UI Router
text:
• Main
  • List
    • **Вывод данных тут: **
    app = angular.module('app', [ 'ui.router' ]); app.config(function($stateProvider, $urlRouterProvider) { $urlRouterProvider.otherwise("/"); $stateProvider .state('main', { url: "/main", templateUrl: "views/main.html" controller: 'MainCtrl' }) .state('list', { url: "/list", templateUrl: "views/list.html", controller: 'ItemsCtrl' }) }); **Вложенность: **
    (в родительской вьюхе) .state('list.item', { url: "/item/:id", templateUrl: "views/item.html", controller: 'ItemCtrl' }) app.controller('ItemCtrl', function($scope, ItemsFactory, $stateParams) { $scope.item = ItemsFactory.getItem($stateParams.id); });
